channel.title: Anti-Abuse tactics?
channel.description:
I have a money tree, where money spawns beside it. Many people have abused it, standing there picking up the money. (its a normal spawn) Is there anyway to make like an anti abuse code or somthing? Like When they pick up that spesific money (100k) they get all of thier money taken away?
I'm using pimpscape.
Anyone got any ideas?

item.title: Anti-Abuse tactics?
item.dc:creator: @female_body_inspecto female body inspector
item.description:
@female_body_inspecto wrote:

oh yes it is possible.make like in area.like if they are in this area and they click on the magic tree and get 100k.there is much more to it…i mean EACH magic tree has to have its own area…

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-Abuse tactics?
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

No, Its impossable…inless…you could make it so you touched the tree and got the money only if your money is below 100k, but they could allways bank it…so, Nope!! Not possible.
